body_html:
@ChengshuLi Thanks for debugging! I agree that the results of your experiment are troubling; something definitely seems wrong.

@asimshankar can you suggest someone to investigate? FYI my totally wild guess (having not investigated at all) is that cc_enable_arenas is broken in our open source builds in some subtle way.

body:
@ChengshuLi Thanks for debugging!  I agree that the results of your experiment are troubling; something definitely seems wrong.

@asimshankar can you suggest someone to investigate?  FYI my totally wild guess (having not investigated at all) is that cc_enable_arenas is broken in our open source builds in some subtle way.
